Dr. Bhupendra Kumar Gandhi

Professor at IIT Roorkee

About

Dr. B.K. Gandhi is a distinguished Professor at IIT Roorkee, specializing in Fluid Mechanics and related fields. He earned his Ph.D. in Fluids Engineering from IIT Delhi and has had a distinguished career. His journey began as a Trainee Engineer at Kirloskar Brothers Ltd., Dewas, and later as Faculty at SGSITS Indore. Currently, he holds the position of Professor at IIT Roorkee. Dr. Gandhi's expertise covers a wide range of topics, including hydro-dynamic machines and erosion wear. With extensive experience and a strong academic background, he continues to make significant contributions to Mechanical Engineering.

Research Interest

Fluid Mechanics, Flow measurement, Artificial roughness and Computational fluid dynamics, Hydro-dynamic Machines, Hydraulic Turbines and Pumps, Performance Testing of SHP stations, Erosion wear, Slurry erosion and cavitation wear
